Package model

Class BlueCard

java.lang.Object
model.Card
model.BlueCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerRepair, F1Race, Lawsuit, SalaryTaxDue, SkiAccident, TipTheServer, WorldCup
public class BlueCard
extends Card
BlueCard card class, a class under Card class, this class indicates all the state and behaviour of the Blue Card.

  • Constructor Details

    • BlueCard

      public BlueCard​(java.lang.String name)
      This is an BlueCard standard constructor that accepts a String as a name that is to be assigned to the BlueCard.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Blue Card to be assigned, also the name inherited from Card class.

  • Method Details

    • blueCardCondition

      public void blueCardCondition​(Player player, Player[] otherplayers, java.lang.String career)
      This method is for the condition of the BlueCard, then activates it. This method accepts Player object. Player array object and a String.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who drawn the blue card.
      otherplayers - the other players besides the player who drawn the blue card.
      career - the career that is assigned to the blue card

    • action

      public void action​(Player player)
      This is the method under BlueCard class, wherein the action of the BlueCard activates. This also accepts an Object Player that is supposed to be the target by the action. Moreover this method is to be inherited by the Child classes of the BlueCard class.
      Parameters:
      player - the player target by the action of the Blue Card.

    • isMatchWithCareer

      public boolean isMatchWithCareer​(Player player)
      This method simply checks whether the player's matches the blue card's generated career.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who drawn the blue card.
      Returns:
      boolean, returns true or false. Returns true if player's career matches, otherwise it returns false.

    • findPlayerCareer

      public Player findPlayerCareer​(Player[] otherplayers, java.lang.String career)
      This method runs in a loop to find the targeted player career.
      Parameters:
      otherplayers - player list
      career - name of career
      Returns:
      the player if same career is found, otherwise null.

    • generateRandom

      public int generateRandom​(int lb, int ub)
      This method generates number that ranges from 1 to 49, then returns it.
      Returns:
      random generated number
